src:
PDIP: Megawati Masih di Jepang, Undangan Kongres NasDem Sudah Disampaikan
06 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Partai NasDem akan menyelenggarakan kongres pada 8-11 November 2019. Sekjen PDIP Hasto Kristiyanto mengatakan telah menyampaikan undangan NasDem kepada Ketua Umum PDIP Megawati Soekarnoputri.
"Ya kami sudah sampaikan (undangan kongres Nasdem) ke Ibu Megawati, saat ini beliau sedang berada di Jepang," kata Hasto di Hotel Sultan, kawasan Senayan, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Namun, Hasto belum bisa memastikan kehadiran ketua umum partai berlambang banteng tersebut. Sebab, Megawati masih berada di Jepang untuk kegiatan pribadi.
"Undangan sudah disampaikan kepada Ibu Megawati Soekarnoputri. Nanti kalau beliau hadir lebih awal ya tentu saja biasanya ibu hadir, tapi nanti kita lihat karena beliau masih di Jepang," ujar Hasto.
Partai NasDem akan menggelar kongres ke-2 pada 8-11 November mendatang. Kongres itu akan membahas persiapan Pilkada 2020 hingga persiapan Pilpres 2024.
"Rancangan-rancangan keputusan yang dilakukan yang pertama pemilihan dan penetapan Ketua Umum Partai NasDem periode 2019-2024. Rancangan keputusan di dalam sidang, sidang komisi pleno dan komisi, di antaranya terkait dengan amandemen, adendum, penambahan, pengurangan, perubahan organisasi yang terkait dengan transformasi maupun regenerasi politik," ujar Ketua Steering Committee Kongres NasDem Johnny G Plate di Kantor DPP NasDem, Jalan RP Soeroso, Gondangdia, Jakarta Pusat.

(rfs/idn)
text:
PDIP: Megawati Is Still in Japan, NasDem Congress Invitation Has Been Delivered
06 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - The NasDem Party will hold a congress on November 8-11, 2019. PDIP Secretary-General Hasto Kristiyanto said that he had conveyed NasDem's invitation to PDIP Chairperson Megawati Soekarnoputri.
"Yes we have conveyed (the invitation of the congress of Nasdem) to Mrs. Megawati, currently she is in Japan," Hasto said at the Sultan Hotel, Senayan area, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
However, Hasto could not confirm the presence of the party chairperson bearing the bull. Because, Megawati is still in Japan for personal activities.
"An invitation has been sent to Ms. Megawati Sukarnoputri. Later, if she attended earlier, of course, she would usually attend, but later we will see because she is still in Japan," Hasto said.
The NasDem Party will hold its 2nd congress on November 8-11. The congress will discuss preparations for the 2020 elections to the preparation for the 2024 presidential election.
"The first draft decisions made the election and appointment of the General Chairman of the NasDem Party 2019-2024 period. The draft decisions in the session, plenary commission sessions and commissions, including related to amendments, addendums, additions, subtractions, organizational changes related to political transformation and regeneration, "said Chairperson of the NasDem Congress Steering Committee Johnny G Plate at the NasDem DPP Office, Jalan RP Soeroso, Gondangdia, Central Jakarta.

(rfs / idn)
